Method D: susceptible balance updated using cases

Source: R/susceptibility.R
estimate_susceptible_case_balance.Rd

Method D: susceptible balance updated using cases

Usage

estimate_susceptible_case_balance(
  panel,
  rho = c(0.05, 0.1, 0.2, 0.5, 1),
  coverage_col = "coverage",
  births_col = "births",
  cases_col = "cases",
  pop_col = "pop_total",
  age_group = "total",
  s0 = NULL
)

Arguments

panel

Panel with births, coverage, and cases.

rho

Reporting fraction (scalar or vector).

coverage_col

Name of coverage column.

births_col

Name of births column.

cases_col

Name of reported cases column.

pop_col

Name of population column used for proportions.

age_group

Label for returned age_group column.

s0

Optional initial susceptible count (defaults to births in first year).

Value

tibble with one row per iso3-year-rho.
